result.name: Woodlands Park Nursery School & Children Centre

reviews.text:
If you read the Ofsted report it says it is outstanding, some people around the area says it is the best. I
Sent 2 of my kids there and it was horrible; I run away.  The workers are miserable never says hi or help you. If you ask how the day went they abruptly tell you to read their diary to find out. To say the least they do not cater to your child needs if you are of a certain status. Not community feel at all and not as diverse and inclusive. Avoid avoid avoid. There are many other places were workers are highly qualified and motivated in looking after your child.

I have used Woodlands Park since I was pregnant with my 1st daughter for midwife appointments, baby weighing.  Then as she got older at Stay and Play sessions, then on to Green room and now in the Blue Room for Pre School. My daughter is thriving there and there is so much to learn and play. The staff are excellent and very caring. I have now applied for my second daughter to start attending from 18months old, fingers crossed she is as fortunate as her sister.

With both my children I used the Children's Centre services at Woodlands (stay and plays, breastfeeding support) and then both children were in childcare at the nursery from 18 months until they went to school (and then afterwards at after-school club). I am now a governor at Woodlands and continue to be overwhelmed by the staff's passion and commitment to their children and families. An inspiring and wonderful place. Thank you Woodlands!

Fantastic children's centre catering for babies, toddlers and parents. The staff are helpful and friendly. The nursery school is outstanding and places highly sought after. All in all, a very caring, safe and inspiring environment for little ones and their carers.

I have applied for the nursery since January and kept asking about the critireas and despite the length of the waiting time ,only to get e negative response of the places are full .
It is end of June and I had contacted them continuesly to find out if we have a space and always got the same answer as the person in charge is not here and that she would call me back which she never did .
I thought that this was a nice nursery but looking from the highly non organised staff perhaps is best i didn't get a place for my child .
When I applied I had given lots of hopes as we  live around at the same street which is one of the critireas of admission .

I'm really not happy the way this was handled at all there for I won't even bother to turn up for any of the activities anymore .

The girl in reception is really nice I have to say .

I'm very disappointed really that I needed to wait over 6 months to be told no once they already are full ðŸ˜’

address: 74-76 Woodlands Park Rd, Harringay Ladder, London N15 3SD, United Kingdom
